verses.text: Rescue me, \nd Lord\nd*, from evil people; from \w the|strong="H1732"\w* violent guard me

\w from|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* plot \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* heart, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* stir up war \w continually|strong="H3068"\w*:

\w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w make|strong="H2803"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* tongue \w as|strong="H3117"\w* sharp \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* serpent’s, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w under|strong="H3605"\w* \w whose|strong="H3605"\w* lips \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* poison \w of|strong="H3117"\w* adders. \qs Selah\qs*

Preserve \w me|strong="H8478"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd Lord\nd*, \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* hands \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w wicked|strong="H8478"\w*, \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* violent guard \w me|strong="H8478"\w* \w from|strong="H8478"\w* \w those|strong="H3644"\w* who \w are|strong="H8193"\w* plotting \w to|strong="H2534"\w* trip up \w my|strong="H8478"\w* feet.

\w The|strong="H8104"\w* proud \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w hidden|strong="H5341"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* trap \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H8104"\w*, cords \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* spread \w as|strong="H2803"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* net \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w feet|strong="H6471"\w*: \w snares|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* set \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w side|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* track. \qs Selah\qs*

\w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H3027"\w* said \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* 
d Lord
d*, “\w My|strong="H6566"\w* \w God|strong="H3027"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3027"\w*; attend, 
d Lord
d*, \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H6566"\w* loud plea.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* 
d \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* savior mighty, \w you|strong="H6963"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* cover \w my|strong="H3068"\w* head \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* day \w of|strong="H3068"\w* battle.

Grant not, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, \w the|strong="H3069"\w* desires \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3069"\w* wicked; \w and|strong="H3117"\w* what \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* purposed, promote \w you|strong="H3117"\w* not.” \qs Selah\qs*

\w Let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* heads \w against|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*. \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* mischief \w they|strong="H3068"\w* prate \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w themselves|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* destruction,

\w may|strong="H8193"\w* \w he|strong="H8193"\w* rain upon them coals \w of|strong="H7218"\w* fire, \w may|strong="H8193"\w* \w he|strong="H8193"\w* strike them \w down|strong="H7218"\w* swiftly, \w to|strong="H7218"\w* rise \w no|strong="H7218"\w* more,

\w no|strong="H1077"\w* place \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* land \w may|strong="H5307"\w* \w there|strong="H6965"\w* \w be|strong="H1077"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* slanderer: \w may|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* violent \w be|strong="H1077"\w* hunted \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w sorrow|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3559"\w* know \w that|strong="H7451"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* \nd Lord\nd* \w will|strong="H3956"\w* do \w right|strong="H3559"\w* \w by|strong="H3559"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* weak, \w and|strong="H2555"\w* \w will|strong="H3956"\w* execute justice \w for|strong="H3559"\w* those who \w are|strong="H1077"\w* needy.

\w Surely|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* righteous \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* name, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* upright \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* live \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* presence.
